physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 9 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: ''#1181 Babi Yar Park and Elie Wiesel 1970s.'' On photograph: ''#1181, Denver 1970, photos by Jack Goldman.''

mods.abstract: A group of children and adults stand in a group around an accordion player near the Babi Yar Park sign during the dedication of Babi Yar Park.
mods.note: Title and description from photo and accession record.
